'''''Chasm Conqueror''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Chasmlighter]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to unlock the [[Statue of The Seven]] found in [[The Chasm (Area)|The Chasm]].

==Trivia==
* The Chinese name of this achievement, coupled with ''[[Perilous Plunge]]'', are derived from the poem {{Lang|''Kuizhou Songs: First of the Ten Quatrains''|zh=蘷州歌十绝句 其一}} by the Tang Dynasty poet {{W|Du Fu}}. The original two lines read: {{zh|白帝高为三峡镇，瞿塘险过白牢关。|lit={{W|Baidicheng}} towers over Sanxia Town, {{W|Qutang Gorge}} is more perilous than Bailao Pass.}}
